lyrics.text:
Pea tu’u hake
Pea pito leva,
‘I he ongoongo lelei
‘O hotau ‘Otua.

Pea tau ongo’i
‘Ene ‘ofa lahi
‘Oku tau ki hotau loto
Ke tau mālohi ai.

Pea tau lava’i
‘A hono talia,
‘A e ngahau ‘o e mate
‘O ta’emanavahē.

He ‘oku tau tau’i
Pea fa’a iku’i
‘A māmani mo Sētani
‘I he’etau tui.

Pea tau mo’ui
‘I he anga’ofa
Ko e tau hēvani si’i
‘Oku tau lava’i.

Ko e ngaahi me’a
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
‘A ia kuo ne tuku
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.

Ke tau fa’a ‘ilo
‘I he Laumālie
‘Oku tau hoko ‘o ‘ilo
Pea mālie ai.
